name: 董容辰
objective:
1. Waves in VCSELs
2. Waves in Wave Guides
3. Waves in Spherical Resonators
schedule:
Introduction (1 week)
Waves in VCSELs (2 weeks)
Waves in Wave Guides (2 weeks)
Waves in Spherical Resonators (3 weeks)
Midterm exam (26-Apr)
Waves in Spherical Resonators (7 weeks)
Final exam (21-Jun)
materials:
Lasers, A. E. Siegman
Laser Electronics, Joseph T. Verdeyen
remarks: 因應疫情遠距教學規劃：●上課方式：遠距上課連結 https://meet.google.com/xus-hxgd-qha●評量方式：期中與期末評量方式待定
